sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Merck ( MRK ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.1%.
Year to date, Merck registers a 9.8% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Nike ( NKE ), trading down 1.6%.
Nike is showing a gain of 5.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 1.1%, and Exxon Mobil ( XOM ), trading up 0.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
